4305230.name: WarDeck
4305230.description:
WarDeck is a turn-based battle game that combines the excitement of classic card games with the strategic depth of positioning on a chess-like board. In this arena, victory goes not just to the one with the best deck, but to the one who manages their cards most wisely on the battlefield.

In the WarDeck universe, the ancient powers of Fire, Water, Earth, and Air collide. Each element possesses a unique playstyle and advantage. You must anticipate your opponent's moves, exploit elemental weaknesses, and strike the deadly blow at the right moment. Whether you embark on epic boss battles alone or clash with players from around the world; the fate of the war is at your fingertips.
